name: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game that allows players to build, explore, and survive in a blocky, procedurally generated 3D world.

name: Minecraft Dungeons
description: An action-adventure game inspired by classic dungeon crawlers, set in the Minecraft universe with cooperative multiplayer gameplay.

name: Minecraft Legends
description: A real-time strategy spin-off set in the Minecraft universe, focusing on building armies and defending against piglin invasions.

name: Hytale
description: An adventure sandbox game similar to Minecraft, featuring a mix of building, exploration, and role-playing elements with a focus on storytelling.

name: Terraria
description: A 2D sandbox game with building, crafting, and exploration elements, often compared to Minecraft for its open-ended gameplay.

name: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet
description: An open-world RPG in the Pokémon series, featuring exploration and battles in the Paldea region.

name: Pokémon Legends: Arceus
description: An action RPG that offers a new Pokémon catching experience with open-world exploration and real-time mechanics.

name: Pokémon Sword & Shield
description: A mainline RPG set in the Galar region, featuring traditional turn-based battles and exploration of vast wild areas.

name: Pokémon Let's Go Pikachu! & Eevee!
description: Remakes of the classic Pokémon Yellow, featuring simplified gameplay and integration with Pokémon GO.

name: Pokémon GO
description: An augmented reality mobile game where players catch Pokémon in the real world using their mobile devices.

name: Roblox
description: An online platform that allows users to create and play games made by other users in a variety of genres, using a wide range of customizable tools.
